p: Only domestic dogs that were raised in the area were considered for the study. The domestic dogs were included after owners’ informed consent. Information regarding age, sex, was obtained after interviewing dog owners ( Table 1). Each dog was examined clinically by the veterinarian and blood samples were collected. Whole blood samples were collected (1–2 mL) by cephalic or jugular venipuncture and serum was separated by centrifugation and stored at −20°C.
